alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 1:12AM MST until November 09 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches with the heaviest accumulations on the east slopes of the northern Sangre De Cristo mountains. Lesser amounts expected along the west facing slopes. * WHERE...Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
